title: Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: If the localization key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the localization key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, when the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value. This value should be able to be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set externalized text in the chart title.
